# offblocks-sdk-java8-okhttp-gson

Off-Blocks REST API
- API version: 0.9.0
  - Build date: 2021-01-27T11:41:31.274+01:00[Europe/Berlin]

No description provided (generated by Swagger Codegen https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-codegen)


*Automatically generated by the [Swagger Codegen](https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-codegen)*


## Requirements

Building the API client library requires:
1. Java 1.7+
2. Maven/Gradle

## Installation

To install the API client library to your local Maven repository, simply execute:

```shell
mvn clean install
```

To deploy it to a remote Maven repository instead, configure the settings of the repository and execute:

```shell
mvn clean deploy
```

Refer to the [OSSRH Guide](http://central.sonatype.org/pages/ossrh-guide.html) for more information.

### Maven users

Add this dependency to your project's POM:

```xml
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.sphereon.sdk</groupId>
  <artifactId>offblocks-sdk-java8-okhttp-gson</artifactId>
  <version>0.9</version>
  <scope>compile</scope>
</dependency>
```

### Gradle users

Add this dependency to your project's build file:

```groovy
compile "com.sphereon.sdk:offblocks-sdk-java8-okhttp-gson:0.9"
```

### Others

At first generate the JAR by executing:

```shell
mvn clean package
```

Then manually install the following JARs:

* `target/offblocks-sdk-java8-okhttp-gson-0.9.jar`
* `target/lib/*.jar`

## Getting Started

Please follow the [installation](#installation) instruction and execute the following Java code:

```java
import com.sphereon.sdk.offblocks.handler.*;
import com.sphereon.sdk.offblocks.handler.auth.*;
import com.sphereon.sdk.offblocks.model.*;
import com.sphereon.sdk.offblocks.api.CustomersApi;

import java.io.File;
import java.util.*;

public class CustomersApiExample {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ApiClient defaultClient = Configuration.getDefaultApiClient();


        CustomersApi apiInstance = new CustomersApi();
        Customer body = new Customer(); // Customer | 
        try {
            CustomerResponse result = apiInstance.createCustomer(body);
            System.out.println(result);
        } catch (ApiException e) {
            System.err.println("Exception when calling CustomersApi#createCustomer");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

    }
}

import com.sphereon.sdk.offblocks.handler.*;
import com.sphereon.sdk.offblocks.handler.auth.*;
import com.sphereon.sdk.offblocks.model.*;
import com.sphereon.sdk.offblocks.api.CustomersApi;

import java.io.File;
import java.util.*;

public class CustomersApiExample {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ApiClient defaultClient = Configuration.getDefaultApiClient();


        CustomersApi apiInstance = new CustomersApi();
        String customerId = "customerId_example"; // String | ID of customer
        String subscriptionId = "subscriptionId_example"; // String | ID of subscription
        String priceId = "priceId_example"; // String | ID of price
        try {
            InvoiceResponse result = apiInstance.getUpcomingInvoice(customerId, subscriptionId, priceId);
            System.out.println(result);
        } catch (ApiException e) {
            System.err.println("Exception when calling CustomersApi#getUpcomingInvoice");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ApiClient defaultClient = Configuration.getDefaultApiClient();


        CustomersApi apiInstance = new CustomersApi();
        Subscription body = new Subscription(); // Subscription | 
        String customerId = "customerId_example"; // String | ID of customer
        String subscriptionId = "subscriptionId_example"; // String | ID of subscription
        try {
            SubscriptionResponse result = apiInstance.updateSubscriptionById(body, customerId, subscriptionId);
            System.out.println(result);
        } catch (ApiException e) {
            System.err.println("Exception when calling CustomersApi#updateSubscriptionById");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}
```

## Documentation for API Endpoints

All URIs are relative to *https://offblocks-niels.eu.ngrok.io/api/v1*

Class | Method | HTTP request | Description
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
*CustomersApi* | [**createCustomer**](docs/CustomersApi.md#createCustomer) | **POST** /customers | Create a customer
*CustomersApi* | [**createSubscription**](docs/CustomersApi.md#createSubscription) | **POST** /customers/{customerId}/subscriptions | Create a subscription
*CustomersApi* | [**getCustomerById**](docs/CustomersApi.md#getCustomerById) | **GET** /customers/{customerId} | Get customer by ID
*CustomersApi* | [**getSubscriptions**](docs/CustomersApi.md#getSubscriptions) | **GET** /customers/{customerId}/subscriptions | Get subscriptions
*CustomersApi* | [**getUpcomingInvoice**](docs/CustomersApi.md#getUpcomingInvoice) | **GET** /customers/{customerId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/product/proposal/{priceId} | Get upcoming invoice for subscription
*CustomersApi* | [**updateSubscriptionById**](docs/CustomersApi.md#updateSubscriptionById) | **PUT** /customers/{customerId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId} | Update a subscription by ID
*DevicesApi* | [**createDeviceForUserId**](docs/DevicesApi.md#createDeviceForUserId) | **POST** /users/{userId}/devices | Create a User associated device
*DevicesApi* | [**deleteDeviceById**](docs/DevicesApi.md#deleteDeviceById) | **DELETE** /devices/{deviceId} | Deletes a device (for all users)
*DevicesApi* | [**deleteDeviceByUserIdAndDeviceId**](docs/DevicesApi.md#deleteDeviceByUserIdAndDeviceId) | **DELETE** /users/{userId}/devices/{deviceId} | Deletes an associated device by Id from the user (does not delete the device from other users)
*DevicesApi* | [**getDeviceById**](docs/DevicesApi.md#getDeviceById) | **GET** /devices/{deviceId} | Get a device by Id or unique device Id
*DevicesApi* | [**getDeviceByUserIdAndDeviceId**](docs/DevicesApi.md#getDeviceByUserIdAndDeviceId) | **GET** /users/{userId}/devices/{deviceId} | Get user associated device by Id or unique device Id
*DevicesApi* | [**getDevicesByUserId**](docs/DevicesApi.md#getDevicesByUserId) | **GET** /users/{userId}/devices | Get User associated devices
*GroupsApi* | [**addGroup**](docs/GroupsApi.md#addGroup) | **POST** /groups | Add a group
*GroupsApi* | [**addUsersToGroup**](docs/GroupsApi.md#addUsersToGroup) | **POST** /groups/{groupId}/users | Add users to a group
*GroupsApi* | [**deleteGroupById**](docs/GroupsApi.md#deleteGroupById) | **DELETE** /groups/{groupId} | Deletes a group by ID
*GroupsApi* | [**getGroupById**](docs/GroupsApi.md#getGroupById) | **GET** /groups/{groupId} | Get group by ID
*GroupsApi* | [**getGroups**](docs/GroupsApi.md#getGroups) | **GET** /groups | Get groups
*GroupsApi* | [**removeUserFromGroup**](docs/GroupsApi.md#removeUserFromGroup) | **DELETE** /groups/{groupId}/users/{userId} | Remove a user from a group
*GroupsApi* | [**updateGroupById**](docs/GroupsApi.md#updateGroupById) | **PUT** /groups/{groupId} | Update a group by ID
*IdentitiesApi* | [**getDidDocumentByIdAndUserId**](docs/IdentitiesApi.md#getDidDocumentByIdAndUserId) | **GET** /users/{userId}/dids/{did} | Get DID document
*IdentitiesApi* | [**getDidDocumentsByUserId**](docs/IdentitiesApi.md#getDidDocumentsByUserId) | **GET** /users/{userId}/dids | Get Identities associated with a user
*OnboardingApi* | [**completeOnboardingVerification**](docs/OnboardingApi.md#completeOnboardingVerification) | **POST** /onboarding/verifications/{token} | Complete a new onboarding verification
*OnboardingApi* | [**initiateOnboardingVerification**](docs/OnboardingApi.md#initiateOnboardingVerification) | **POST** /onboarding/verifications | Initiate a new onboarding verification
*PaymentsApi* | [**createCheckoutSession**](docs/PaymentsApi.md#createCheckoutSession) | **POST** /payments/{customerId}/checkout | Create a customer checkout session
*ProductsApi* | [**getProductById**](docs/ProductsApi.md#getProductById) | **GET** /products/{productId} | Get product by ID
*ProductsApi* | [**getProducts**](docs/ProductsApi.md#getProducts) | **GET** /products | Get products
*SignaturesApi* | [**requestSignature**](docs/SignaturesApi.md#requestSignature) | **POST** /signatures/request | 
*UserSessionsApi* | [**deleteUserSessionByUserIdAndSessionId**](docs/UserSessionsApi.md#deleteUserSessionByUserIdAndSessionId) | **DELETE** /users/{userId}/sessions/{sessionId} | Delete a user session by ID
*UserSessionsApi* | [**deleteUserSessionsByDeviceId**](docs/UserSessionsApi.md#deleteUserSessionsByDeviceId) | **DELETE** /devices/{deviceId}/sessions | Delete all user sessions by device ID
*UserSessionsApi* | [**deleteUserSessionsByUserId**](docs/UserSessionsApi.md#deleteUserSessionsByUserId) | **DELETE** /users/{userId}/sessions | Delete all user sessions by user ID
*UserSessionsApi* | [**getUserSessionByUserIdAndSessionId**](docs/UserSessionsApi.md#getUserSessionByUserIdAndSessionId) | **GET** /users/{userId}/sessions/{sessionId} | Get user sessions by user ID and session Id
*UserSessionsApi* | [**getUserSessionsByDeviceId**](docs/UserSessionsApi.md#getUserSessionsByDeviceId) | **GET** /devices/{deviceId}/sessions | Get user sessions by device ID
*UserSessionsApi* | [**getUserSessionsByUserId**](docs/UserSessionsApi.md#getUserSessionsByUserId) | **GET** /users/{userId}/sessions | Get user sessions by user ID
*UsersApi* | [**addUser**](docs/UsersApi.md#addUser) | **POST** /users | Add a new user
*UsersApi* | [**deleteUserById**](docs/UsersApi.md#deleteUserById) | **DELETE** /users/{userId} | Delete a user by ID
*UsersApi* | [**getUserById**](docs/UsersApi.md#getUserById) | **GET** /users/{userId} | Get user by ID
*UsersApi* | [**getUsers**](docs/UsersApi.md#getUsers) | **GET** /users | Get users
*UsersApi* | [**updateUserById**](docs/UsersApi.md#updateUserById) | **PUT** /users/{userId} | Update a user by ID

## Recommendation

It's recommended to create an instance of `ApiClient` per thread in a multithreaded environment to avoid any potential issues.

## Author
